name: Rain (itch) (Zejak)
description: In the Czech Republic, we have a game called Prší (raining) which a lot of us enjoys. It is very similar to Mau Mau or Uno. Unfortunately you can only play with one robot right now. This game was just a practice for me and I don't expect too many people to play it, but maybe you'll get to like it. And also don't be afraid to criticize a bit:)
